title: Mahomes is Where the Heart Is
description:
Mina and Ben Solak of The Ringer react to the news about Sean Payton stepping aside from the Saints before looking ahead to conference championship weekend: Will the Bengals defense show up in back to back weeks? Has Patrick Mahomes unlocked his final form and/or made it to the S tier? Will Kyle Shanahan continue to have Sean McVay's number? Will the Rams defensive line feast behind a renewed Von Miller?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
